casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Kim Antonio GRIFFIN. No. 507P03. Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 5, 2004. William P. Hart, Special Deputy Attorney General, Thomas J. Keith, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 8th day of September 2003 by Defendant to Proceed in Forma Pauperis:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 5th day of February 2004."
